document.full_text: indian police will file charges against a former telecoms minister and other government and corporate officials this week, a government lawyer said on tuesday, in a multi-billion dollar telecoms corruption case that has shaken government and business.
document.title: india police to charge ex-minister in telecoms graft
lines_and_colors: indian police will file charges against a former telecoms minister and other government and corporate officials this week, a government lawyer said on tuesday, in a multi-billion dollar telecoms corruption case that has shaken government and business.
